info.name: WSO2 Identity Server - Application Management Rest API
info.description:
This document specifies a **Application Management RESTful API** for **WSO2 Identity Server** .


Contact Support:
 Name: WSO2
 Email: architecture@wso2.org

item.name: applications
import
Create application from an exported XML file

request.description: This API provides the capability to store the application information, provided as a file.

header.description: Location of the newly created application.

item.name: Update application from an exported XML file

request.description: This API provides the capability to update an application from information that has been exported as an XML file.

item.name: {application Id}
inbound-protocols
saml
Retrieve SAML2 authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve SAML2 authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: Update SAML2 authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description:
This API provides the capability to store SAML2 authentication protocol parameters of an application.
- There are three methods to create/update SAML2 authentication protocol configuration.
    1. Metadata File (by sending the Base64 encoded content of the metadata file.)
    2. Metadata URL
    3. Manual configuration

header.description: Location of the newly created SAML Inbound configuration.

item.name: Delete SAML2 authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete SAML2 authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: oidc
Retrieve OIDC authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve OIDC authentication protocol parameters of an application.

response.name: OK

item.name: Update OIDC authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to store OIDC authentication protocol parameters of an application.

header.description: Location of the newly created OIDC Authentication Configuration.

item.name: Delete OIDC authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete OIDC authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: Regenerate the OAuth2/OIDC client secret of application

request.description: This API regenerates the OAuth2/OIDC client secret.

response.name: OK

item.name: Revoke the OAuth2/OIDC client of application

request.description: This API revokes the OAuth2/OIDC client secret. To re-activate the client, the client secret needs to be regenerated.

item.name: passive-sts
Retrieve Passive STS authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve Passive STS authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: Update Passive STS authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to store passive STS authentication protocol parameters of an application.

header.description: Location of the newly created Passive STS Authentication Configuration.

item.name: Delete Passive STS authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete Passive STS authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: ws-trust
Retrieve WS Trust authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve Passive STS authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: Update WS Trust authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to store WS Trust authentication protocol parameters of an application.

header.description: Location of the newly created WS Trust Authentication Configuration.

item.name: Delete WS Trust authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete WS Trust authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: {inbound Protocol Id}
Retrieve custom Inbound authentication protocol parameters of application.

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve custom inbound authentication protocol parameters of an application.

item.name: Update the custom inbound authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to store custom inbound authentication protocol parameters of an application.

header.description: Location of the newly created Custom Inbound authentication protocol Configuration.

item.name: Delete custom inbound authentication protocol parameters of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete custom inbound authentication protocol of an application.

item.name: Retrieve inbound protocol configurations of application

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve authentication protocol configurations of an application.

item.name: Retrieve application by ID

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the application information by ID.

response.name: OK

item.name: Partially update application by ID

request.description: This API provides the capability to partially update an application by ID.

item.name: Delete application by ID

request.description: This API provides the capability to delete an application by ID.

item.name: Export application as an XML file

query.description: Specifies whether to export secrets when exporting an application.

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the application as an XML file.

item.name: resident
Get Resident application

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the resident application information.

response.name: OK

item.name: Update Resident Application

request.description: This API provides the capability to update Resident Application Configuration.

header.description: Location of the provisioning configuration of the resident application.

item.name: meta
inbound-protocols
Retrieve the list of inbound authentication protocols available

query.description: Send only the custom inbound protocols.

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the list of inbound authentication protocols available. If the query parameter 'customOnly' is set to true, only custom inbound protocols will be listed.

item.name: Retrieve all the metadata related to the auth protocol SAML

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve all the metadata related to the auth protocol SAML.

item.name: Retrieve all the metadata related to the authentication protocol OAuth / OIDC

request.description:
This API provides the capability to retrieve all the metadata related to the authentication
 protocol OAuth / OIDC.

item.name: Retrieve all the metadata related to the auth protocol WS Trust

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve all the metadata related to the auth protocol WS_Trust.

item.name: Retrieve all the metadata related to the custom auth protocol identified by the inboundProtocolId

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve all the metadata related to the custom auth protocol identified by the inboundProtocolId.

response.name: OK
response.body:
{
 "displayName": "My Custom Protocol",
 "properties": [
  {
   "name": "encryptionAlgorithm",
   "displayName": "Encryption Algorithm",
   "type": "STRING",
   "required": true,
   "availableValues": [
    [
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p",
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-1_5"
    ],
    [
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p",
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-1_5"
    ]
   ],
   "defaultValue": "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p",
   "validationRegex": "^[a-b][A-B]*",
   "displayOrder": 1,
   "isConfidential": "<boolean>"
  },
  {
   "name": "encryptionAlgorithm",
   "displayName": "Encryption Algorithm",
   "type": "STRING",
   "required": true,
   "availableValues": [
    [
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p",
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-1_5"
    ],
    [
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p",
     "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-1_5"
    ]
   ],
   "defaultValue": "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p",
   "validationRegex": "^[a-b][A-B]*",
   "displayOrder": 1,
   "isConfidential": "<boolean>"
  }
 ]
}

item.name: Retrieve the sample adaptive authentication templates.

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the sample adaptive authentication templates.

item.name: List applications

query.description: Maximum number of records to return.
Number of records to skip for pagination.

Condition to filter the retrieval of records. Supports 'sw', 'co', 'ew' and 'eq' operations. Currently supports only filtering based on the 'name' attribute.

/applications?filter=name+eq+user_portal
/applications?filter=name+co+prod

Define the order in which the retrieved records should be sorted.
_This parameter is not supported yet._

Attribute by which the retrieved records should be sorted.
_This parameter is not supported yet._

Specifies the required parameters in the response
_This parameter is not supported yet_

request.description: This API provides the capability to retrieve the list of applications.

response.name: OK

item.name: Add application

query.description: Pre-defined template to use when creating the application.

request.description: This API provides the capability to store the application information provided by users.

header.description: Location of the newly created application.
